name: df-cpmat
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(ccpmat, cmpo(s0, s1, cfn, universe, crab(s2, cfv(cbs, co(cv(s0), cmat, cfv(cpl1, cv(s1)))), wral(s3, cv(s0), wral(s4, cv(s0), wral(s5, cn, wceq(cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s3), cv(s2), cv(s4))), cv(s5)), cfv(c0g, cv(s1)))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ ConstPolyMat =(s0 ‚àà Fin, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà(Base `(s0[Mat](Poly1 ` s1)))| ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s0, ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà s0, ‚àÄ(s5 ‚àà ‚Ñï,((coe1 `(s3[s2]s4))` s5)=(0 ` s1))))})
comment: The set of all constant polynomial matrices, which are all matrices whose entries are constant polynomials (or "scalar polynomials", see ~ ply1sclf ). (Contributed by AV, 15-Nov-2019.)
